parameters.name: Filter
parameters.description: Specifies filtering conditions. Multiple filter parameters use AND logic.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The Web Application Firewall (WAF) instance ID.
> Call the [DescribeInstanceInfo](~~140857~~) operation to retrieve the WAF instance ID.

parameters.name: Metric
parameters.description:
Specifies the data type to be returned. Valid values:

*   qps: Returns the queries per second (QPS) processed by WAF. This value is calculated using a peak detection method: QPS is measured every 10 seconds, and the highest value within the specified time range is returned.
*   total_requests: Returns the total number of requests processed by WAF.
*   top5\_status: Returns the top 5 HTTP status codes returned by the WAF to clients, along with their corresponding time series statistics.
*   top 5\_upstream_status: Returns the top 5 HTTP status codes returned by the origin server to clients, along with their corresponding time series data.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of WAF instance. Valid values:

*   **cn-hangzhou**: The Chinese mainland.
*   **ap-southeast-1**: Outside the Chinese mainland.
